Name: Alleppey Backwaters
Description: Known as the 'Venice of the East,' famous for houseboat cruises along the scenic backwaters.

Name: Munnar

Name: Fort Kochi
Description: A historical neighborhood with colonial architecture, Chinese fishing nets, and cultural influences.

Reviews: Rich in history and culture.; Great place to explore on foot.
